headline: Why ConocoPhillips (COP) is a Great Buy Amidst the LNG Boom
summary: ConocoPhillips (NYSE:COP) is included among the 12 Best LNG Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. ConocoPhillips (NYSE:COP) has a 60-year history of leadership in LNG, and its proprietary Optimized Cascade Process liquefaction technology provides more than 120 MTPA of the world’s LNG supply capacity. It was reported earlier this month that the company has […]
